verbs.description: jcpenney [V: has] hired a new ceo months after an abrupt resignation by its former chief executive jcpenney has hired a new ceo jill soltau the struggling department store has been without a leader since may when its former ceo marvin ellison resigned to take up a new role as the head of lowe cfo lowe jill soltau ceo ron johnson marvin ellison joann stores chief executive jcpenney jeffrey davis
